mean_cn: n. 玉米；  adj. 黄色的，玉米色的
mean_en: tall annual cereal grass bearing kernels on large ears: widely cultivated in America in many varieties; the principal cereal in Mexico and Central and South America since pre-Columbian times
sentence: The maize from the field is ready to be harvested.
sentence_trans: 地里的玉米准备被收割。
